overview: George Gershwin miraculously melded classical idioms, jazz, blues, and spirituals in this quintessentially American masterpiece about a crippled beggar, the headstrong woman he loves, and the community that sustains them both; presented here in an acclaimed productions from San Francisco Opera
tagline: From the San Francisco Opera: "Porgy and Bess" by George Gershwin
title: The Gershwins' Porgy and Bess
